700960f-a.title: Bronx: Eastchester Road - Pelham Parkway South
700960f-a.text:
Eastchester Road, at the S.E. corner of Pelham Parkway South,
showing the Castillian Royal inn.
1922.

700961f-a.title: Bronx: Eastchester Road - Pelham Parkway South
700961f-a.text:
Eastchester Road, at the S.E. corner of Pelham Parkway South (foreground), showing the Castillian Royal inn.

700959f-a.title: Bronx: Eastchester Road - Pelham Parkway South
700959f-a.text:
Eastchester Road, south from Pelham Parkway South. On the extreme left appears part of the Castillian Royal inn, at the S.E. corner of
the two thoroughfares.
About 1924.
700959f-a.folder: Eastchester Road & Pelham Parkway South, Bronx, NY

701617f-b.text:
(1)
Pelham Parkway South, at the S.W. corner of Eastchester Road, showing the Pelham Health Inn. The view is in an easterly direction.
August 3, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
N:5 e 3iS
(e)
A view of the rear of the inn.
August 3, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
0e: 6o 31G

700958f-a.title: Bronx: Eastchester Road - Pelham Parkway South
700958f-a.text:
Eastchester Road, south from Pelham Parkway South. The
thoroughfare was paved by the W.P.A.
January 26, 1937
W.P.A. Photo
Five Boroughs Project
